Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: TaskSplit Patch (Performance Increase)
Metadata.Note: Modifies geometry and light division count, granularity, and priority. Doesn't affect visuals.
Metadata.Author: auser1337, Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: 60 FPS (With Deltatime)
Metadata.Note: You may encounter softlock during some boss fights cinematic (such as Rom, Ludwig, Laurence ...).\nDisable patch to progress.
Metadata.Author: Lance McDonald (manfightdragon), Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Restore Debug Menu (READ NOTES)
Metadata.Author: Whitehawkx, auser1337
Metadata.Note: This patch requires debug font files, It will crash without them. Access the menu by pressing left side of touchpad.

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Disable vsync
Metadata.Note: This patch shouldn't be used without the 60 FPS (With Deltatime) patch
Metadata.Author: illusion

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Unlock Game Region
Metadata.Note: Unlocks the game region to support additional language options, switches the X and Circle buttons
Metadata.Author: Lance McDonald (manfightdragon)

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Enemy Control
Metadata.Note: R3 to control targeted enemy / L3 to go back
Metadata.Author: stagvant

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (360p)
Metadata.Note: Recommended for weaker GPUs. Enemy HP bars are often invisible when in the center of the screen.
Metadata.Author: LeDragoX

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (484p)
Metadata.Note: Recommended for weaker GPUs. Enemy HP bars are often invisible when in the center of the screen.
Metadata.Author: LeDragoX, xzy

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (560p)
Metadata.Note: Lowest it can go without the target HP bar being invisible.
Metadata.Author: Ashen

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (2560x1440)
Metadata.Note: Requires 'isDevKit = true' in the shadPS4 config. Needed for resolution patches above 1080p
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (3840x2160)
Metadata.Note: Resolutions above 1080p can break the game (missing geometry, invisible enemies, crashes) because of PS4 memory limitation. Use them at your own risk. Requires 'isDevKit = true' in the shadPS4 config. Needed for resolution patches above 1080p
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (2560x1080) (21:9 2.37)
Metadata.Note: Requires 'isDevKit = true' in the shadPS4 config. Needed for resolution patches above 1080p
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (3440x1440) (21:9 2.38)
Metadata.Note: Resolutions above 1080p can break the game (missing geometry, invisible enemies, crashes) because of PS4 memory limitation. Use them at your own risk. Requires 'isDevKit = true' in the shadPS4 config. Needed for resolution patches above 1080p
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (3840x1080) (32:9 ~3.55)
Metadata.Note: Resolutions above 1080p can break the game (missing geometry, invisible enemies, crashes) because of PS4 memory limitation. Use them at your own risk. Requires 'isDevKit = true' in the shadPS4 config. Needed for resolution patches above 1080p
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337
